How do I get NPWP in Indonesia?

NPWP (tax number) process varies across Indonesia! - Corporate tax: 22% standard, 0.5% small business (PP 23/2018)
- Personal income tax: 5-35% progressive brackets
- VAT (PPN): 11%
- Withholding tax: 2-20% (PPh 21/23/26)
- BPJS: 4% health, 6.24% employment
- NPWPD: 10% hospitality (Bali)
- Deadlines... In Jakarta it's all online, in Bali you might need to visit the office, in smaller islands personal connections help. What is **overview**?

KITAP (Kartu Izin Tinggal Tetap / Permanent Stay Permit Card) is Indonesia's equivalent of permanent residency.

Duration: 5 years (renewable indefinitely)

- ✅ Live in Indonesia indefinitely
- ✅ NO annual extensions (only renew every 5 years)
- ✅ Multiple entry (integrated re-entry permit)

> "Re-entry permits have the same validity period as ITAS/ITAP"

- NO separate IMK/MERP application needed (automatic with KITAS/KITAP)

Indonesia joined Madrid Protocol: 2018

1. File single application at WIPO (World Intellectual Property Organization)

3. WIPO forwards to DJKI
4. DJKI examines per Indonesian law

4. Vital Interests - Protect life/health of data subject
5. Public Interest - Government tasks, public health
